main event: A distant speeding object was observed moving from west to northeast on 10/29/57 in Fort Worth, Texas.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 10 seconds and moved in a straight line,There was no exhaust or trail visible from the object,Observers were impressed by its high speed and the object made no sound,The altitude of the object varied significantly during the sighting,Possible explanations for the sighting included it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object.
witness description: Reliability of observers considered good; mentioned by intelligence officer VT Leonard.
